story.title: #MuseumOfTheFuture
story.description: The first #MuseumOfTheFuture debate 'A living building: how could the British Museum best deliver its constant purpose for a changing public?' took place on Thursday 11 September

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

image.caption: Follow the first #MuseumOfTheFuture debate online. We’ll be live tweeting from 18.30 BST http://t.co/XPkypDT0Il http://t.co/okaGZhmZ0f

quote.text: Follow the first #MuseumOfTheFuture debate online. We’ll be live tweeting from 18.30 BST http://t.co/XPkypDT0Il http://t.co/okaGZhmZ0f

image.caption: The theatre is filling up for the first #MuseumOfTheFuture debate. This one is all about the building itself. http://t.co/3ij73TtxPi

quote.text: The theatre is filling up for the first #MuseumOfTheFuture debate. This one is all about the building itself. http://t.co/3ij73TtxPi

image.caption: The panel has arrived on the stage. Chair Dame Liz Forgan is giving an intro to the #MuseumOfTheFuture debate http://t.co/L2Q7jcrcbK

quote.text: The panel has arrived on the stage. Chair Dame Liz Forgan is giving an intro to the #MuseumOfTheFuture debate http://t.co/L2Q7jcrcbK

image.caption: The panellists are @Bonn1eGreer Antony Gormley, Jim Cuno, Wim Pijbes and Nicholas Kenyon #MuseumOfTheFuture http://t.co/yFrUh2nV5W

quote.text: The panellists are @Bonn1eGreer Antony Gormley, Jim Cuno, Wim Pijbes and Nicholas Kenyon #MuseumOfTheFuture http://t.co/yFrUh2nV5W
Wow Anthony Gormley and Bonnie Greir on panel @britishmuseum tonight ; well worth all that queuing

image.caption: The Museum's Director, Neil MacGregor, is giving a potted history of the Museum and its building #MuseumOfTheFuture http://t.co/x6resyYnZn

quote.text: The Museum's Director, Neil MacGregor, is giving a potted history of the Museum and its building #MuseumOfTheFuture http://t.co/x6resyYnZn
Neil says with rising visitor numbers "the building is really struggling to handle these crowds" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Very impressed by the @britishmuseum #MuseumOfTheFuture as an engagement campaign. Great use of feedback as content. More please!
#MuseumOfTheFuture @britishmuseum Liz Forgan "We all know the toilets are terrible....let's steer away from that"
Jim Cuno of @GettyMuseum says "the only limit to the Museum's ambition is time and money" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Antony Gormley says that there's "possibility of real change" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Antony Gormley: "Neil has given us a rubric under which it can renew and reexamine its purpose" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Excited to be @britishmuseum for #MuseumOfTheFuture some interesting points raised already about the reading room and it's purpose
Antony Gormley: "use the Reading Room to get Africa out of the basement!" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Nicholas Kenyon of @BarbicanCentre: "people's experience of interacting with the arts has changed seismically" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Nicholas Kenyon: "focus on the outside of the building to connect with the public" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Sir Nicholas Kenyon: @britishmuseum is a temple of the arts #MuseumOfTheFuture
#MuseumOfTheFuture What you see when you come to @britishmuseum? You see a temple @BarbicanCentre
Nicholas Kenyon says close Great Russell st and make an open plaza in front of @britishmuseum ...love it! #MuseumOfTheFuture
Wim Pijbes of @rijksmuseum says: "people go to a museum for many reasons – there's no wrong reason to go to a museum" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Wim Pijbes: "the visit to the museum starts in the head of the visitor" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Wim Pijbes: "the web is the ideal partner for arts institutions" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Wim Pijbes: "our demands are more and more individual" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Wim Pijbes: Open access is the future of the museum #MuseumOfTheFuture @britishmuseum
#antonygormley @britishmuseum is the fruit of enlightenment thinking. Promise of social justice. Exploration of culture #museumofthefuture
Bonnie Greer: "our determination to go forward will enable the young to support us and defend us" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Love the description of the @britishmuseum being a "21st Century Agora" #MuseumOfTheFuture
The @britishmuseum represents the west as its dream self #BonnieGreer #MuseumOfTheFuture
@britishmuseum I'm all for #MuseumOfTheFuture but please bring back the reading room, it's such a historic and beautiful room
@britishmuseum east side of Tott Court Road as far as Soton Row laid out for educational, literary and cultural pursuits #MuseumOfTheFuture
Entry fees are a terrible idea and defeats the purpose of the @britishmuseum #MuseumOfTheFuture
dear @britishmuseum please don't bring back the reading room, was a bad use of space, gusty, + its replacement is better #MuseumOfTheFuture
We're now onto views from the audience. Overcrowding, cooperation w other museums and accessibility all being discussed #MuseumOfTheFuture
Awe vs Welcome @britishmuseum #MuseumOfTheFuture
Great voice from audience on "feeling able to come" - if that really is just about the railings, why not take them down? #MuseumOfTheFuture
Community programmes are ways to invite diversity into working with the collection #MuseumOfTheFuture @britishmuseum
Cruise ships use tv screens to alert passengers to less crowded areas of the ship. Could it work @britishmuseum? #MuseumOfTheFuture
A lush garden as soon as you pass through the barrier fence around the museum... Beautiful idea ..Wim Pijbes #MuseumOfTheFuture
Gormley, how to create porosity between the street and the museum, key answer is the internet - and more doors #MuseumOfTheFuture
Barriers not all physical, language of empire sticks. People arrive with notions of GB which rn't all + Prove them wrong #museumofthefuture
#MuseumOfTheFuture Tell more stories says an enlightened Friend. Silk Road, Africa, stories of how the objects arrived ...
Liz Forgan to the audience: "you're a didactic lot! Should objects speak for themselves?" #MuseumOfTheFuture
Lots of fascinating views tonight. Liza Forgan returning to the panel now. We'll be summing up the #MuseumOfTheFuture debate tomorrow...

image.caption: In the meantime, have your say and fill in our #MuseumOfTheFuture survey https://t.co/L8hcJiK0BO http://t.co/OMKkDmeg4I

quote.text: In the meantime, have your say and fill in our #MuseumOfTheFuture survey https://t.co/L8hcJiK0BO http://t.co/OMKkDmeg4I
Thought provoking evening @britishmuseum thinking about #MuseumOfTheFuture - for once a genuine attempt at consultation. Great panel
